_comment: Discord Bot Configuration - Fill in your Discord Server IDs
_how_to_get_ids: Right-click channel/role in Discord > Copy ID (Enable Developer Mode first)

channels._comment: Main channel IDs for restock alerts and approvals
channels._restockApprovals_note: Channel where approval messages with buttons are posted (VA + MD)
channels._localRestockVA_note: Public channel for VA restock alerts (where approved alerts are posted)
channels._restockApprovalsMD_note: MD approval channel (can be same as restockApprovals for combined approvals)
channels._localRestockMD_note: Public channel for MD restock alerts (where approved alerts are posted)
channels._weeklyReportVA_note: Channel where weekly VA recap reports are posted (Sunday reports)
channels._weeklyReportMD_note: Channel where weekly MD recap reports are posted (Sunday reports)

commandChannels._comment: Restrict commands to specific channels (leave empty string "" to allow anywhere)
commandChannels._comment2: If set, users can only use these commands in the specified channels
commandChannels._report_past_restock_va_note: Channel where /report_past_restock_va command can be used
commandChannels._restock_in_progress_va_note: Channel where /restock_in_progress_va command can be used
commandChannels._lookup_va_restocks_note: Channel where /lookup_va_restocks command can be used
commandChannels._report_past_restock_md_note: Channel where /report_past_restock_md command can be used
commandChannels._restock_in_progress_md_note: Channel where /restock_in_progress_md command can be used
commandChannels._lookup_md_restocks_note: Channel where /lookup_md_restocks command can be used

channelNames._comment: Friendly channel names for error messages (optional)
channelNames._comment2: Format: "CHANNEL_ID": "#channel-name" - Used in error messages when wrong channel

roles._comment: Discord role IDs for mentions and permissions
roles._localRestockVA_note: Role mentioned when VA restock alerts are posted
roles._localRestockMD_note: Role mentioned when MD restock alerts are posted
roles._weeklyReportVA_note: Role mentioned when VA weekly recap reports are posted
roles._weeklyReportMD_note: Role mentioned when MD weekly recap reports are posted
roles._admin_note: Role required to use /admin_clear_restocks command (also requires Administrator permission)

stores._comment: Store lists organized by store type and region
stores._comment2: Format: "Store Name - Address" (address will be extracted automatically in alerts)

settings._autoCleanupEnabled_note: Enable automatic cleanup of old restock data
settings._cleanupDay_note: Day of week to run cleanup (lowercase: sunday, monday, tuesday, etc.) - Recommended: sunday for weekly reset
settings._cleanupTime_note: Time to run cleanup (24-hour format: HH:MM)
settings._weeklyReportHour_note: Hour (0-23) to send weekly report on Sunday (default: 20 = 8pm EST). Cleanup runs 1 hour after report. Note: Time is based on server timezone. For EST, ensure server is set to EST/EDT timezone.
